remarks: The ` ZZ ` ring homomorphism is an isomorphism for ` N = 0 ` .  (We only show group isomorphism here, but ring isomorphism follows, since it is a bijective ring homomorphism.)  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 21-Apr-2016.)  (Revised by AV, 13-Jun-2019.)
